content.question: Why does the male student congratulate the female student?

choices.label: She was elected president of the student council.
She received a good grade on a test.
She was named an honor student.

content.answer: She was elected president of the student council.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
